Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-25032 affecting package tcl for versions less than 8.6.13-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-25032 affecting package tcl for versions less than 8.6.13-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package tcl is earlier than 8.6.13-1, affected by CVE-2018-25032
